description: Type constraints and coercions for Perl .

dependencies.name: perl
dependencies.description:
Perl 5 is a highly capable, feature-rich programming language with over
27 years of development.

dependencies.name: perl-devel-stacktrace
dependencies.description: An object representing a stack trace.

dependencies.name: perl-eval-closure
dependencies.description: Safely and cleanly create closures via string eval

dependencies.name: perl-mro-compat
dependencies.description: Provides several utilities for dealing with method resolution order.

dependencies.name: perl-role-tiny
dependencies.description: Role::Tiny - Roles: a nouvelle cuisine portion size slice of Moose

dependencies.name: perl-sub-quote
dependencies.description: Sub::Quote - Efficient generation of subroutines via string eval

dependencies.name: perl-test-fatal
dependencies.description: Incredibly simple helpers for testing code with exceptions

dependencies.name: perl-test-needs
dependencies.description: Skip tests when modules not available.

dependencies.name: perl-try-tiny
dependencies.description: Minimal try/catch with proper preservation of $@

dependent_to.name: perl-datetime-format-strptime
dependent_to.description: Parse and format strp and strf time patterns

dependent_to.name: perl-datetime
dependent_to.description: DateTime - A date and time object for Perl

dependent_to.name: perl-log-dispatch
dependent_to.description: Dispatches messages to one or more outputs

dependent_to.name: perl-datetime-timezone
dependent_to.description: DateTime::TimeZone - Time zone object base class and factory

dependent_to.name: lcov
dependent_to.description:
LCOV is a graphical front-end for GCC's coverage testing tool gcov. It
collects gcov data for multiple source files and creates HTML pages
containing the source code annotated with coverage information. It also
adds overview pages for easy navigation within the file structure. LCOV
supports statement, function and branch coverage measurement.

dependent_to.name: perl-params-validationcompiler
dependent_to.description:
Params::ValidationCompiler - Build an optimized subroutine parameter
validator once, use it forever
